title: OPEC, ECS, OPEC Fund to hold 3rd annual legal workshop on national climate laws
description: Vienna, Austria, 5 October 2021--The OPEC Secretariat will host jointly with the Energy Charter Secretariat (ECS) and the OPEC Fund for International Development the Third Annual Legal Workshop on Monday, 18 October 2021, via videoconference to address national climate laws and jurisprudence evolution, with a focus on emissions reduction and energy access.
